item.title: Repository Structure in a Sole Nx Experimental Module
item.description: Preface # Some of my readers already know that I’m a scraper engineer in my daily job. My team migrated from a monolithic to a microservice architecture almost 10 months ago, and I still believe it was the best decision we made last year.
